授業目的: The purpose of the course is to give students the necessary tools they need to become proficient English communicators. Emphasis is primarily placed on speaking and listening, with pair and group work being key to success.
到達目標:
- to explore and discuss a wide range of topics
- to feel confident expressing your ideas and opinions
- to successfully undertake an interview in English
- to create and do a presentation based on class material

トピック.授業計画1: A new unit from the textbook will be studied every two weeks. Midway through the term, there will be a speaking test, and the final lesson will be a presentation of your choosing.
トピック.授業外学習2: Homework as assigned by the teacher.

教科書/Required texts1: Smart Choice Level 3 Student Book with Online Practice (Fourth Edition)
